- Neuropsychiatric Inventory Score – NPI score.

- ADAS-COG Total Score – cognitive test.

- Simple Reaction Time (SRT) – reaction time.

- Buschke Selective Reminding (BSR) Test – memory test.

- Percent Change in Brain Volume – MRI volumetrics.

- Normalized Brain Volume – MRI.

- Insulin Sensitivity via HOMA IR – metabolic biomarker.

- CMRGlu Indices – cerebral metabolic rate of glucose via FDG-PET.

- Mini-mental State Examination (MMSE) Score – cognitive test.

- Global and Regional CMRglu Index by APOE Epsilon-4 Allele – imaging biomarker.

- Simplified Spatial Paired Associate Learning (SSPAL) Response – cognitive test.

- Fasting Plasma Glucose – metabolic.

- Inflammatory Biomarkers (CD40, CRP, IL-6, TNF-alpha) – blood markers.

- Choice Reaction Time (CRT) Test – reaction time.

- Clinician Based Impression of Change-plus (CBIC+) Score – clinical rating.

- Glycosylated Hemoglobin HbA1c – metabolic.

- Body Weight and Height – anthropometric.

- CMRglu indices – same as earlier.

- APOE Epsilon-4 allele subtype – genetic biomarker.
